question: I was told I have diabetes last Nov.  SInce then I have been on 3 different meds and with each change my levels get higher.  Started with metforman and it made me sick with terrible headaches, then glipizide which made me gain weight even after changing my diet.  Now I am on junuvia and my level wont come down below 160.  For 2 days I was out of meds and took my sugar and it was 111 the lowest it has been in about 3 months. I don't understand what is going on.  The other meds I take is Livothyroxin, Trazadone, and Straterra.
title: Coul I have been misdiagnosed
